item.title: Assets - a worked example
item.description: I’ve used bank accounts, credit card accounts and term accounts, transactions, and payees in mmex for many years now, previously on Windows and now on Linux (mmex v1.7.0), and am very happy with it - huge thanks from me to all the developers! Occasionally I would try and use assets and asset accounts but always got confused and gave up. This time I am determined to succeed, and wish there was a worked example (or even a tutorial) to help.
